content.rendered:
Directed by Hemant Sharan

Written by Sanjay Jain. Amit Sarkar. Hemant Sharan

Cast Garvitt Attri (Young Aman). Rahul Bagga (Surendar). Simrithi Bhatija (Simran). Samiksha Bhatnagar (Meghna). Rahul Dev (Daljeet Singh). Ashish Dixit (Omkaar). Abhishek Duhan (Shaurya Diwan). Chahat Khanna (Lead in Club Song). Shalendra Saroha (Inspector Singh). Aham Sharma (Aman). Rajeev Sharma (Docter). Atul Srivastava (meghna Father)

Language Hindi

Producers Sachit Jain. Sakshi Jain. Sawan Kumar. Shalendra Saroha. Hemant Sharan. Neeraj Kumar Sharma.
